pages.title: Obtaining Herbs
pages.text: All herbs, except for the $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs#witchweed)Witchweed$(/l), can be obtained by using $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/mutation)Mutavis$(/l) on specific vanilla blocks in the world. Each herb can later be refined or used directly in crafting, brewing, or rituals.

pages.title: Core Herbs
pages.text: These four herbs are the backbone of advanced crafting, primarily refined with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#mortar)Mortar and Pestle$(/l) into potent powders and pastes used in brewing and rituals.

pages.title: Spirit Bloom
pages.text: A pale blueish flower that clings to damp roots. Found in $(bold)Swamps$() and $(bold)Mangrove Swamps$(). Refines into Spirit Powder.

pages.title: Dreamshroom
pages.text: A rosy cap that sheds soft, mist-like spores. Found in $(bold)Old Growth Pine Taiga$() and $(bold)Mushroom Fields$(). Refines into Dream Paste.

pages.title: Ghost Fern
pages.text: A dusky frond with translucent edges that shimmer in low light. Found in $(bold)Dark Forests$(). Refines into Ghost Powder.

pages.title: Siren Kelp
pages.text: A purple kelp that sways as if listening beneath the waves. Found in $(bold)Oceans$(). Refines into Siren Paste.

pages.title: Specialized Herbs
pages.text: These herbs are used in specific mechanics outside the core systems, often requiring their own crafting processes or unique tools.

pages.title: Witchweed
pages.text: A withered stalk crowned with violet thorns. Common in $(bold)Forest Biomes$(). Used to craft items that channel corruption and decay.

pages.title: Lotus Flower & Blossom
pages.text: A radiant bloom rising from still waters. Found in $(bold)Swamps$(). Used to craft items related to cleansing and protection.$(br) The Lotus Flower block can be bonemealed.

pages.title: Celestial Bloom
pages.text: A pale flower whose petals shimmer like starlight, blooming only in $(bold)Meadows$(). It is vital for $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/celestial_infusion)Celestial Infusion$(/l).
